availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, circuit judge. Virginia native. Married to Sarah P. Howorth Graham on November 21, 1822. Father of Sarah Graham, H. A. Graham, and Margaret Graham. Judge of the Simpson Circuit Court in Simpson County in 1860 and 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, District 2, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Simpson County Marriages, Film #000339890, p. 91-92
Find A Grave, "Judge Asher W Graham (May 17, 1799-September 2, 1866)," Memorial #116840662, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116840662 (accessed May 17, 2017).
KYR-0001-004-1391.
